My kids have been using CoordiChild courses daily, and my 15 year-old now knows right from left. A very handy thing she has found, when she is learning to drive! My 11-year-old continues to benefit weekly from all of the exercises and activities.Tara M, Pediatric Occupational Therapist in Wyoming, USA

My son is in week 15 but we\'ve taken a break this week as we\'re back at school. It was easier to do when he was at home. He\'s now able to ride a bicycle without practice wheels and rides a 7 km trail with us. My boy loves the program - he calls it Kid Gym Routine.Sam
We are completely blown away with the results of the Coordikids courses. Never in my wildest dreams did I think that we would see the results that we have so far.Lorna - Happy Mum
Yearly immediate Access to all the exercises
We offer a monthly or yearly payment package. Each package includes a 7-day trial.
Monthly Access to a new set of 7-9 exercises every 2 weeks
Click here to book a free 15 minute consulation.
The CK Home School Course is all about encouraging students with targeted movements to help them with:

CoordiKids Home Courses use occupational therapy exercises, adapted for use at home, and packaged into fun, easy to follow, instructional videos.


Our Home Course offer specialist exercises that are easy to use with no set-up or preparation in advance: simply have access to the Internet, log in, and hit play for your child to follow along for 15 minutes a day.


You’re welcome to join in to encourage and have fun with your child, too!

As an Educator, you want the best for your students. You can enhance development of foundational skills such as attention, coordination, fine motor skills, ball skills and many more.


The Preschool Course is designed by specialist pediatric occupational therapists to pack the best content into videos that run for about 15 minutes.


CoordiKids enhances development of all children and it leaves the educators hands free to observe and support while the children follow the videos.

CoordiKids Classroom Course exercises are designed by specialist pediatric occupational therapists to pack the best content into videos that run for 5–10 minutes, these short sets of exercises are fun and are easily incorporated into a classroom schedule.


CoordiKids classroom course encourages students’ body and brain to improve concentration and attention in the classroom.


Teachers have 30 sets of exercises to use randomly at any time that the class needs a movement break.

The CK Homeschool Course is designed by specialist paediatric occupational therapists to pack the best content into videos that run for 5–10 minutes, these short sets of exercises are fun and are easily incorporated into a home school schedule.


The Homeschool Course encourages students’ body and brain to improve concentration and attention in the home school setting. Homeschool educators receive 30 sets of exercises to use randomly at any time that a student needs a movement break.

Applied Sensory Motor Skills\n\nThe development of all the skills in Levels 1 to 7 create improved functions in daily tasks such as manipulating a pencil, handwriting, scissor skills, using an effective upright posture, emotional regulation, planning, and subsequently academic skills and executive functioning.

Laterality\n\nExercises that promote distinguishing left from right. These exercises help establish a dominant hand and improve awareness of directions. This is an important foundational skill for reading, writing, spelling, as well as playing sports.

What you’ll learn in this course” to “Movement breaks are specific types of movement sequences that engage students’ bodies and brains to improve concentration and attention in the classroom. Movement breaks have been shown to reduce fidgeting, improve focus, offer a break for emotional & sensory regulation, and make learning more efficient.
